content.query:
CREATE TABLE [tino].[Streaming]
(
    UniqueOrderID NVARCHAR(256),
    UniqueMovieID NVARCHAR(256),
    UniqueCustomerID NVARCHAR(256),

    SourceID INT,
    TransactionID NVARCHAR(256),
    MovieID NVARCHAR(256),
    CustomerID NVARCHAR(256),

    StreamStart DATETIME NULL,
    StreamEnd DATETIME NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (UniqueOrderID),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
